name: Lab Rats (flgina, PepegaCheeser, girroni, Twalt97, Tommytippi)
name_original: Lab Rats (flgina, PepegaCheeser, girroni, Twalt97, Tommytippi)
description:
Main Features

·  Glow in the dark.

·  Shrink through small places.

·  Destroy obstacles/enemies with your laser eye.

Summary

Embark on a journey where you will learn more about yourself and your abilities. Try to complete the mad scientists maze, fight his evil creations, and navigate through the dark, beware of the traps! You play as a rat that has been abused from previous experiments. Thanks to these experiments you are able to glow in the dark, shrink through small places, and destroy obstacles or enemies in your path with your laser eye. Your only goal is to escape Professor H’s home laboratory and figure out what happened to your family.
